item.title: Workforce Engagement
item.description: Creating an engaged workforce We apply behavioral Psychology principles and methods to answer questions of employee sentiment within the broader organizational system. A component of this systemic change process includes our engagement assessment: As of Winter 2023, the primary eg ‚Äúoff-the-shelf‚Äù product is an engagement survey developed in partnership with Eagle I.O. The eg team is also working on an package to capture online survey responses.

eg was founded in 2022 by John Kulas (aka ‚ÄúJohn-o‚Äù), an Industrial and Organizational Psychologist. The focus of the consultancy is on Statistical and Psychometric applications. The mission of eg includes a continuation of collaboration and mentorship for graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology, and these students contribute to eg via contract assignments. Dr.¬†Kulas‚Äô resume can be accessed here. Contact eg: John-o Kulas: 651-216-3353 jtkulas@ergreports.com
-driven processes üöÄ We also consult on statistical and psychometric projects as well as helping organizations transition to -enabled workflows

-driven processes üöÄ We provide consultation on statistical and psychometric projects as well as helping organizations transition to -enabled workflows. Why ? Because it is: Powerful Flexible Free This platform has the capability to power many business functions. This website, for example, was built with .1 With eg‚Äôs help, your business can transition business processes to this platform that greatly minimizes overhead costs - this is the primary reason our clients find that our prices come in on the ‚Äúlow end‚Äù of bids.

Here we present two interactive visualizations from 2 different larger projects to highlight some interactive graphic capabilities. Project codename: ‚õΩ This project included the creation of an interactive map to locate petrol stations that carry ethanol-free gasoline within the 5-state region surrounding the a local car club. This group does social ‚Äúruns‚Äù periodically throughout the summer months and did not have a map-based resource to help them locate these specialized gas stations while on their far-from-home ‚Äúruns‚Äù‚Ä¶

item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: Engagement Survey Feedback Presentation Slides (Example/Tutorial)
item.description: background-image: url(https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/be/Sharingan_triple.svg) ??? Image credit: Wikimedia Commons class: inverse, center, middle Get Started Hello World Install the xaringan package from Github: remotes::install_github("yihui/xaringan") ‚Äì You are recommended to use the RStudio IDE, but you do not have to. Create a new R Markdown document from the menu File -> New File -> R Markdown -> From Template -> Ninja Presentation;1 ‚Äì
